entry.title: Learning Python
entry.summary: Learn The Basic I had taken serveral python courses before and wrote basic loop and if statements but actually applying coding prinicpals to tackle a problem/solution is a whole different story. entry.title: Building a Cyber Range Lab
entry.summary: Why Build? For any inspiring professional wanting to break into the tech field, you have to learn and perform your craft quickly. I’ve experinced over time the fastest way to learn is to get straight into the hands-on portion and combine the learning experience with visual aids like reading documentation and watching videos.
